scripts.?version: Shows the version of npm that this project uses.
scripts.?clean: Cleans the build and dist directories.
scripts.?info: Shows information about the scripts supported by this project.
scripts.?lint: Lints all .js files in the 'src' tree.
scripts.?docs: Creates the JSdoc in the distribution (dist) directory.
scripts.docs: jsdoc src/*.js  -c .jsdoc.conf.json -d dist/apidocs/$npm_package_version && jsdoc src/*.js -c .jsdoc.conf.json -d dist/apidocs/latest
scripts.?build: Uses the projects build manager (currently rollup) to make the build
scripts.?zip: Zips up the current release area to a single file which cann be uploaded to the GitHub release area.
scripts.?docker:build: Builds Wica-JS in a docker container that can be shared with a Wica-HTTP installation
scripts.?docker:push: Pushes the docker build to docker hub.
scripts.?github-release: Tags the current Git repo according to the version in this package file and pushes the release to GitHub
scripts.github-release: git tag -f $npm_package_version && git push --tags -f origin master
scripts.?assemble: Creates and populates the dist directory.
scripts.assemble: ([[ -d dist ]] || mkdir dist) && cp -R README.md package.json ./dist/rel
scripts.?publish-local-snapshot: Publishes a snapshot release to PSI's local npm server.
scripts.publish-local-snapshot: npm run clean && npm-force-resolutions && npm_update_snapshot && npm run build && npm run assemble && npm publish ./dist/rel
scripts.?publish-local-release: Publishes a versioned release to PSI's local npm server.
scripts.publish-local-release: npm run clean && npm-force-resolutions && npm run build && npm run assemble && npm publish ./dist/rel
scripts.?npm_update-to-latest: Updates package dependencies to the latest versions and installes them, ignoring specified versions.
